problems.title: Reverse a Number
problems.description:
You are given a non-negative integer N. Your task is to reverse the digits of N.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print a single integer, the reversed number.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
123

Sample Output
321

Explanation:
Reversing 123 gives 321.
hintsList: Extract digits from right using modulo 10, and build the reversed number by multiplying by 10 and adding the digit.
